se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Interface Dependent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Continuous1DPDDependent, Model, ProperDependent, RealParameter, RootedBifurcatingTreeParameter, RootedTreeParameter, StateParameter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanMap, BooleanParameter, DLRSModel, DoubleArrayMap, DoubleMap, DoubleParameter, DupLossProbs, GammaDistribution, GammaSiteRateHandler, GenericMap, IntArrayMap, IntMap, IntParameter, MPRMap, NamesMap, NormalDistribution, RBTree, RBTreeArcDiscretiser, RealParameterUniformPrior, RTree, StringMap, SubstitutionModel, TimesMap, UniformDistribution

    public interface Dependent
    Interface for vertices in an acyclig digraph (DAG) of model dependencies. Most commonly, such a graph will consist of state parameters as sources, sub-models corresponding to conditional probabilities as sinks, possibly with cached data structures in between. Note: The DAG will induce any Bayesian hierarchy of the sub-models, but, as mentioned, allows for additional intermediary data structures.

    See sub-interfaces StateParameter and ProperDependent for details on the expected behaviour. The purpose of these interfaces is mainly to be able to do optimised updates when state changes have been proposed or rejected.

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
